Html: Will Cataclysm version have mastery and reforging factored in?  Everything I've been able to glean from various sources seem to indicate that maximizing mastery above haste and crit is the way to reforge, at least for arcane mages.
Mastery and reforging are in. I know Kaven has the Mastery stats figured out for mages, not 100% sure on the other modules. But yes they are in.
Nah, we thought we would leave out a vital statistic of the game from our calculations.

Out of curiosity are you planning some sort of reforging UI (or is it already there but I'm too blind to see it)? It's easy enough to go in and just edit item stats to reflect the mastery changes, but we have to do the calculation about how many points are being changed. Be nice if Rawr figured that out for us.

edit: Nevermind, I just found where the reforge button is. I guess I am going blind >_<
